title: Minister for Finance under section 9(1) of the Finance (No. 2) Act, 1968 (No.
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Post Office Savings Bank (Interest
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Post Office Savings Bank (Interest 

on Deposits) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited post office saving bank (interest deposits) regulation 2023

title: Minister for Finance under section 9(1) of the Finance (No. 2) Act, 1968 (No.
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 1 October 2023.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 1 October 2023.

title: Minister for Finance under section 9(1) of the Finance (No. 2) Act, 1968 (No.
heading: 3. The Post Office Savings Bank (Interest on Deposits) Regulations 2021
text_raw:
3. The Post Office Savings Bank (Interest on Deposits) Regulations 2021 
(S.I. No. 14 of 2021) are revoked with effect from the date specified in 
Regulation 2.
text_norm: 3 post office saving bank (interest deposits) regulation 2021 (s.i no 14 2021) revoked effect date specified regulation 2

title: Minister for Finance under section 9(1) of the Finance (No. 2) Act, 1968 (No.
heading: 4. The rate of interest on a deposit, within the meaning of section 14(1) of
text_raw:
4. The rate of interest on a deposit, within the meaning of section 14(1) of 
the Finance Act, 1948 (No. 12 of 1948), is hereby prescribed as 0.75 per cent per 
annum. 

GIVEN under the Seal of the National Treasury 
Management Agency, 
21 September, 2023. 

FRANK O’CONNOR, 
Chief Executive. 

DAVE MCEVOY, 

Director. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [462] 3
text_norm: 4 rate interest deposit within meaning section 14(1) finance act 1948 (no 12 1948) hereby prescribed 0.75 per cent per annum given seal national treasury management agency 21 september 2023 frank connor chief executive dave mcevoy director notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 22nd september 2023 462 3

title: Minister for Finance under section 9(1) of the Finance (No. 2) Act, 1968 (No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to prescribe a new rate of interest for 
deposits in the Post Office Savings Bank. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [462]
